description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of DLLs that are known to be abused from suspicious locations
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
name: Abusable DLL Potential Sideloading From Suspicious Location
query: (dll.path:(/.*\\\\[Cc][Oo][Rr][Ee][Cc][Ll][Rr]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/ OR /.*\\\\[Ff][Aa][Cc][Ee][Ss][Dd][Kk]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/ OR /.*\\\\[Hh][Pp][Cc][Uu][Ss][Tt][Pp][Aa][Rr][Tt][Uu][Ii]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/ OR /.*\\\\[Ll][Ii][Bb][Cc][Ee][Ff]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/ OR /.*\\\\[Zz][Ii][Pp][Dd][Ll][Ll]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/) AND ((dll.path:(/.*\:\\\\[Pp][Ee][Rr][Ff][Ll][Oo][Gg][Ss]\\\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\\\[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\\\\.*/ OR /.*\\\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp][Oo][Rr][Aa][Rr][Yy]\ [Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn][Ee][Tt].*/ OR /.*\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\\\.*/)) OR ((dll.path:/.*\:\\\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\\\.*/ AND dll.path:/.*\\\\[Ff][Aa][Vv][Oo][Rr][Ii][Tt][Ee][Ss]\\\\.*/)) OR ((dll.path:/.*\:\\\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\\\.*/ AND dll.path:/.*\\\\[Ff][Aa][Vv][Oo][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Ee][Ss]\\\\.*/)) OR ((dll.path:/.*\:\\\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\\\.*/ AND dll.path:/.*\\\\[Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Aa][Cc][Tt][Ss]\\\\.*/)) OR ((dll.path:/.*\:\\\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\\\.*/ AND dll.path:/.*\\\\[Pp][Ii][Cc][Tt][Uu][Rr][Ee][Ss]\\\\.*/))))
